root.name: Kagirinaki Tatakai
root.description: A fairly revolutionary forgotten gem that featured non-mirrored, separately drawn sprites for the left-and-right walking animations, a diverse range of enemies, fully destructible environments, a convincing physics engine, and a plethora of weapons (for its time), allowing the player to carry three or more weapons.External linksRetro Japanese Computers: Recomended Games, Hardcore Gaming 101
